title: [Video 457] Reginald Braithwaite: First-Class Commands — An unexpectedly fertile design pattern
Introducing Right ST
description:
Managing ServerTemplates and RightScripts as code

RightScale’s built in version control system for ServerTemplates™ and RightScripts™ works great if you are only person maintaining them, but if you are working on them with a team or if you have experience with other version control systems like Git or Subversion, it definitely leaves much to be desired. We’ve been dealing with this here at RightScale too, and that is why we are introducing Right ST, the ServerTemplate and RightScript management tool. It is a command line utility that you can use to import and export your ServerTemplates and RightScripts between your own version control system or even just your local workstation.
